code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link,NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const[username,setUsername]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const loggedIn=localStorage.getItem("isLoggedIn")==="true";const userName=localStorage.getItem("username")||"";setIsLoggedIn(loggedIn);setUsername(userName);},[]);const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();const newUser=document.getElementById("username").value;if(newUser.trim()){localStorage.setItem("isLoggedIn","true");localStorage.setItem("username",newUser);setIsLoggedIn(true);setUsername(newUser);}};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem("isLoggedIn");localStorage.removeItem("username");setIsLoggedIn(false);setUsername("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-brand",children:"Parf\xFCmvil\xE1g"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/katalogus",className:"nav-link",children:"Katal\xF3gus"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/kereses",className:"nav-link",children:"Keres\xE9s"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/rolunk",className:"nav-link",children:"R\xF3lunk"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-dropdown",children:isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-primary",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Kil\xE9p\xE9s"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profil",className:"nav-link",children:username})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/bejelentkezes",className:"nav-link",children:"Bejelentkez\xE9s"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/regisztracio",className:"nav-link",children:"Regisztr\xE1ci\xF3"})]})})]});};export default Navbar;
